validationErrors.message: Field "testCases": Test case 3: Input should be in stdin format, not variable assignment format
Field "testCases": Test case 3: Expected output should be in stdout format, not data structure format

originalDocument.title: Reverse Only Letters
originalDocument.content: Given a string s, reverse the string according to the following rules: Only letters are reversed, while all other characters remain in the same position. Return s after reversing it.
constraints: s consists of characters with ASCII values in the range [33, 122].
